action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Rusted makes two attacks, using Greatsword or Javelin in any combination.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.
